options.name: 1) Give me a smile and then say 'hello'!
2) Give me a smile and say 'hello' in sync!
3) Try performing a cute gesture. Notice how your expression changes with the movement.
4) How do you express sadness? Show me through your body movements and facial expressions simultaneously.
5) Can you channel your inner Peppa Pig and say something while mimicking her cute expressions and voice?
6) Let’s do some Spider-Man cosplay. Perform a signature Spider Man gesture with your body, while saying a classic quote from Spider Man at the same time.
7) Picture this: Spider-Man just landed right in front of you. How would a true fan react? Don’t just tell me—show me! Use your face and body to express that sheer excitement!
8) Here's how to react when someone compliments you: Laugh with exaggerated expressions, use bold body language, and enthusiastically shout: 'Thank you! I really appreciate your feedback.'
9) Imagine you're diving into the open sea! Act out your swimming style, and don’t forget the facial reactions.
